title: Anathema

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may only attack during Full Moons.

- Under a Blood Moon, you will rampage at your house in addition to attacking, your defense will be upgraded to Basic, and your attack will be upgraded to Unstoppable.

desc:
Post 837
Control Immune (Blood Moon)
Redirection Immune (Blood Moon)
Roleblock Immune (Full Moon, Blood Moon)
